name: asm-dom
description: A virtual dom in web assembly

scripts.compile: mkdir -p compiled && mkdir -p temp && npm run compile:bindings && npm run compile:cpp && npm run compile:asmjs && npm run compile:wasm && rimraf temp
scripts.compile:bindings: cd src/helpers && python $EMSDK/emscripten/incoming/tools/webidl_binder.py bindings.idl glue && cd ../../
scripts.compile:asmjs: mkdir -p temp/asmjs && mkdir -p compiled/asmjs && emcc --bind temp/asm-dom.bc --post-js src/helpers/glue.js -o temp/asmjs/asm-dom.asm.js && npm run compile:asmjs:module
scripts.compile:wasm: mkdir -p temp/wasm && mkdir -p compiled/wasm && emcc --bind -s BINARYEN=1 temp/asm-dom.bc --post-js src/helpers/glue.js -o temp/wasm/asm-dom.js && npm run compile:wasm:module
scripts.compile:wasm:module: ncp temp/wasm compiled/wasm && concat-cli -f src/helpers/prefix.js temp/wasm/asm-dom.js src/helpers/postfix.js -o compiled/wasm/asm-dom.js
scripts.test: npm run compile && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs nyc --require babel-register mocha --recursive
scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/helpers
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore src/helpers
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/asm-dom.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/asm-dom.min.js
scripts.build:compile: npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build

author: Matteo Basso (https://github.com/mbasso)
